name: Cube Twist - Minimalist Puzzle
description:
Do you like to challenge yourself?
Do you like puzzle games?
Do you like relaxing music?
Do you like a clean design?

Cube Twist is what you need. Challenge your mind. All you have is black and white tiles.

*You need to make all tiles same color(all black or all white) to complete a level. But it is not as easy as it sounds.

With SIMPLE CONTROLS, just swipe your finger to roll the cube.

New levels will be coming regularly.
